title: CPUC approves ‘first-ever’ statewide energy efficiency market transformation initiatives
description: The California Public Utilities Commission approved statewide energy efficiency Market Transformation Initiatives to promote energy-efficient products, benefiting ratepayers.
content: The California Public Utilities Commission approved statewide energy efficiency Market Transformation Initiatives to promote energy-efficient products, benefiting ratepayers.
